content:
skill 1
skill id: ddb8fe598cde44c08b11fa19a8c5
skill name: Battery Overheat
skill description: Indicates the device's battery is excessively hot, which can be a safety concern and reduce battery life.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: fc6053ae296b4a3e8a60fbdbea2b
	name: laptop_brand
	attribute description: The brand of the laptop experiencing overheating issues.

attribute 2
	attribute id: a21660b594914c2cb40be465450e
	name: laptop_model
	attribute description: The specific model of the laptop experiencing overheating issues.

attribute 3
	attribute id: 3e839e2c29dc48fbaf02c40960e5
	name: temperature
	attribute description: The temperature at which the laptop's battery is overheating.

attribute 4
	attribute id: dace2c4cf34c4f86a0d134f4cc4a
	name: symptoms
	attribute description: The symptoms associated with the laptop's overheating issues.
	attribute similar values: ['slow performance', 'shutting down unexpectedly', 'battery draining quickly', 'laptop case getting hot', 'fans running at high speed']



skill 2
skill id: 050d53c0e3154003a5c0e2e62d13
skill name: Hardware Upgrades
skill description: Covers the process of upgrading or replacing hardware components on the device, such as adding more memory or replacing a faulty part.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: 0bbd3b59105448edbcff7738be4d
	name: component
	attribute description: The laptop component to upgrade.
	attribute similar values: ['RAM', 'storage', 'CPU', 'GPU', 'Wi-Fi card', 'battery']

attribute 2
	attribute id: 9714b37926264782acb9ebcbd6c7
	name: brand
	attribute description: The brand of the laptop component.

attribute 3
	attribute id: 8308c332422a4a99929370288083
	name: model
	attribute description: The model of the laptop component.

attribute 4
	attribute id: 1deabc0cb68446a8ae6ad9369b70
	name: size
	attribute description: The size of the laptop component.



skill 3
skill id: 6dd4fb3727004e83821ecb1761c5
skill name: Network Setup
skill description: Guides the user through the process of setting up a new network.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: e50d5015ae324361895ca1e40ab0
	name: network_type
	attribute description: The type of network to be set up.
	attribute similar values: ['wired', 'wireless', 'cellular']

attribute 2
	attribute id: 711756845cfa427296d7a23eb892
	name: equipment_type
	attribute description: The type of equipment for the network setup.

attribute 3
	attribute id: 93b66e8621f8435f8d5d7f60f466
	name: connection_type
	attribute description: The type of connection to be established.

attribute 4
	attribute id: c024643a59774b63821525ea347d
	name: network_name
	attribute description: The desired name for the network.
	attribute similar values: ['string', 'up to 32 characters']

attribute 5
	attribute id: 8aabe276bdac4ef180ddad0cb8d2
	name: security_protocol
	attribute description: The security protocol to be used for the network.

attribute 6
	attribute id: ca1dc8ad5a6348efb82246b4eceb
	name: password
	attribute description: The desired password for the network.



skill 4
skill id: 85a27c7b39cf457a9aa41bb5f535
skill name: Software Updates
skill description: Refers to the process of updating the device's operating system or apps to the latest version.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: 30785f65968e4d39b0342bb4ebc2
	name: software_name
	attribute description: The name of the software to update.
	attribute similar values: ['Windows', 'MacOS', 'Chrome OS', 'Linux', 'Microsoft Office', 'Adobe Creative Cloud']

attribute 2
	attribute id: 9c53014695cd4882a248116da5a1
	name: update_type
	attribute description: The type of update to perform.
	attribute similar values: ['minor', 'major', 'security', 'optional']



skill 5
skill id: 48ceb321311548fbb337deef2ce0
skill name: Slow Performance
skill description: Describes the issue of a device performing slowly and possible solutions.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: bb93e2b884d04ef0b8a233c0af7e
	name: brand
	attribute description: The brand of the laptop experiencing slow performance.

attribute 2
	attribute id: dfb38cc53ca74298b9ffa5455a13
	name: model
	attribute description: The model of the laptop experiencing slow performance.
	attribute similar values: ['XPS 13', 'EliteBook', 'ThinkPad', 'MacBook Pro', 'Aspire', 'VivoBook']

attribute 3
	attribute id: 3c7664f9c19041a89c6fd5bffbc3
	name: operating_system
	attribute description: The operating system installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.

attribute 4
	attribute id: 225e9bdded6b40d98e5da510790d
	name: memory
	attribute description: The amount of memory (RAM) installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.

attribute 5
	attribute id: da1a3ed30f7c46719a68f6b9b3cc
	name: storage
	attribute description: The type of storage installed on the laptop experiencing slow performance.



skill 6
skill id: 4b88755ab2944c4f814bd83dea48
skill name: Software Troubleshooting
skill description: Help with diagnosing and resolving issues with software applications, including identifying and fixing bugs, errors, and compatibility problems.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: 08ed18e60e8a4e6ea8fe8a9f81c5
	name: software_name
	attribute description: The name of the software that is causing trouble.

attribute 2
	attribute id: 11588d39ed304abbb86196668360
	name: problem_type
	attribute description: The type of problem encountered with the software.
	attribute similar values: ['not opening', 'crashing', 'freezing', 'slow performance', 'error messages']

attribute 3
	attribute id: 6496e3aa3939436a86a1c3464126
	name: error_message
	attribute description: The exact error message displayed by the software.
	attribute similar values: ['Cannot open because of an error', 'The application has stopped working', 'Adobe Acrobat unexpectedly quit', 'Google Chrome has crashed', 'Zoom not responding', 'Slack has encountered an issue']




skill 7
skill id: c829f53085d8443486932fc11fdd
skill name: Network Issues
skill description: Identifies and resolves common network connectivity problems.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: a28fd7963f6440bb97994130b856
	name: issue
	attribute description: The type of network issue being experienced.

attribute 2
	attribute id: eb437a0222264c09877031f9d689
	name: device
	attribute description: The device experiencing the network issue.
         attribute similar values: [ 'computer, smartphone, tablet, gaming console']

attribute 3
	attribute id: 5f3947d6e27f48d992d8b44f8627
	name: network_type
	attribute description: The type of network being used.
	attribute similar values: ['Wi-Fi', 'Ethernet', 'Cellular']

attribute 4
	attribute id: cc8ed42a1e0c40b68f37655acfa4
	name: service_provider
         attribute description: The internet service provider.
         attribute similar values: ['Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, etc.']



skill 8
skill id: 0d45d1beeab6442fadabc2598239
skill name: Troubleshoot Router
skill description: Provides steps to diagnose and resolve common router issues.
attribute:
attribute 1
	attribute id: e41208cf5f2d4ef09065a3120490
	name: router_brand
	attribute description: The brand of the router having issues.

attribute 2
	attribute id: 3c632ec0cd2b43a68b48763bda30
	name: router_model
	attribute description: The specific model of the router having issues.

attribute 3
	attribute id: 497087f4fc5d4b0a95bcbdcbadad
	name: router_symptom
	attribute description: The symptom being experienced with the router.
	attribute similar values: ['No internet connection', 'Slow internet', 'Wi-Fi signal issues', 'Cannot connect to router', 'Frequent disconnections']

As a Classifier you should follow these instructions:

1. Go through the above schema of skills. The schema can consist of 1 to 8 skills. 
Each skill has ID associated with it in alphanumeric format, skill name and skill description. For each skill there are also attributes and their values. Attribute can be retrieved for a particular skill if requested explicitly. It may also include "attribute similar values", which mean extracted attribute can deviate from those in schema, but should be similar.
2. Below you'll be provided with the utterance and your task is to find the skill from the list above that best matches the utterance. Please also retrieve all relevant attributes present in the given utterance. If no attributes present in the utterance, return "none" for the value of the utterance. If multiple attributes are provided, fill all the attributes

Respond with the best matching skill ID for the given utterance in YAML format:
```skills: 
- intent_id: <intent_id1> 
  slots: 
   - <slot1_id>: <slot1_value> 
   - <slot2_id>: <slot2_value> 
```

If no intent can be identified, please return:
```yaml
intents:
- id: none
  slots: []
```

I need help. I'm experiencing regular network connectivity issues in the office. This ongoing issue is not only frustrating but also impacts my productivity and ability to meet deadlines.

rejected:
skills:
- intent_id: c829f53085d8443486932fc11fdd
  slots:
   - issue: regular network connectivity issues
     device: computer
     network_type: Wi-Fi
     service_provider: None
